mapper.select: select t.APPROVE_FLOW_ID as INSTANCE_ID, t.CAMPSEG_ID as BUSINESS_ID, 'node_0' as NODE_ID, '开始' as NODE_NAME, t.CREATE_USER_ID APPROVER, t3.USER_NAME as APPROVER_NAME, '提交策划' DEAL_OPINION, t.CAMPSEG_STAT_ID SUBMIT_STATUS, t3.CITY_ID CITY_ID, t4.CITY_NAME APPROVAL_USER_CITY, t3.DEPARTMENT_ID DEPT_ID, t5.TITLE APPROVAL_USER_DEPT, t.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_DATE from MCD_CAMP_DEF t left join mcd_sys_user t3 on t.CREATE_USER_ID = t3.USER_ID left join mcd_sys_city t4 on t3.CITY_ID = t4.CITY_ID left join mcd_sys_department t5 on t3.DEPARTMENT_ID = t5.DEPT_ID where t.CAMPSEG_ID = #{campsegRootId}
